entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
